Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Two Pieces from The Love for Three Oranges, op. 33ter

1922

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 3'

  • 1. March
  • 2. Scherzo

These pieces are arrangements of music from the opera The Love for Three Oranges (op. 33). Prokofiev also created an orchestral suite from the opera (op. 33bis), which contains both pieces.

1. March

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Scherzo

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 4
